message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this incredible product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I understand that $15000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $13500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $13500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting a bit far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $12800. What do you think?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11500 for it. Can you consider my offer?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $12800, but I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I can offer it to you for $12800, and I'll also include a premium service package worth $800. What do you think?
I appreciate the extras, but I'm still not willing to pay $12800. I'm willing to pay $11800 for the product, and I'll take the premium service package. Can you consider my offer?

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $12500, and I'll still include the premium service package. What do you think?

I understand your frustration, but I'm still not willing to pay $12500. I'm willing to pay $11900 for the product, and I'll take the premium service package. This is my final offer. Can you consider it?
